Atlanta.Westside Reservoir Park: Westside Park is a proposed park in the City of Atlanta to be located on the site of the former Bellwood Quarry. The park is between Johnson Road and Donald Lee Hollowell Parkway and between the neighborhoods of Bankhead and West Midtown and immediately to the northeast of the neighborhood of Grove Park. Westside Park will be a major green space project of the Atlanta BeltLine master plan.
